title: India’s AI summit draws global leaders, big pledges and some chaos
description: As the U.S. and China battle to dominate artificial intelligence, India has attempted to highlight that there are other pathways to navigate the silicon surge.
content:
As the United States and China battle to dominate artificial intelligence, this week India attempted to highlight that there are other pathways to navigate the silicon surge.
Billed as the first high-level AI gathering to be held in the Global South,... [7639 chars]

title: Hackers Used AI to Breach 600 Firewalls in Weeks, Amazon Says
description: Over the last five weeks, a limited number of hackers broke into more than 600 firewalls across dozens of countries with the help of widely available artificial intelligence tools, according to security research from Amazon.com Inc.
content:
Over the last five weeks, a limited number of hackers broke into more than 600 firewalls across dozens of countries with the help of widely available artificial intelligence tools, according to security research from Amazon.com Inc.

title: What Google Is Doing to Increase Its AI Chip Sales

content: Tech giant Google (GOOGL) is looking to sell its artificial intelligence chips, called TPUs, to a wider range of customers, but doing so may be difficult. According to The Wall Street Journal, the main reason is that chipmaker Nvidia (NVDA) already d... [1769 chars]

title: "Democracy cannot function in absence of accountability": Hungary Dy Speaker warns on AI risks at AI Summit
description: Hungary's Deputy Speaker Lajos Olah on Friday warned that unchecked artificial intelligence could erode the very foundations of democratic systems and said that 'democracy cannot function in the absence of accountability,' as leaders gathered for a session titled 'AI for Democracy- Reimagining Governance in the Age of Intelligence' at the India AI Impact Summit 2026.

title: India chases 'DeepSeek moment' with homegrown AI models
description: Fledgling Indian artificial intelligence companies showcased homegrown technologies this week at a major summit in New Delhi, underpinning big dreams of becoming a global AI power. title: Economic Resilience Amid Government Cuts and Tariff Challenges
description: U.S. economic growth slowed in the fourth quarter due to significant government spending cuts, but consumer and business investment remained strong. Inflation is rising partly because of tariffs, and despite government shrinkage, the economy is supported by consumer spending and business investment, particularly in artificial intelligence.
content: The U.S. economy experienced an unexpected slowdown in the fourth quarter as federal government spending dropped significantly, marking the largest decline since 1972. Despite this, steady consumer spending and business investments cushioned the econ... [760 chars]
